import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import logo from '../assets/img/Logos.png' import api from '../services/api' import moment from 'moment-timezone' export default function ChatPage({ match }) { const [mensagens, setMensagens] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function loadMensagens() { const response = await api.get(`/getChat?ra=${match.params.ra}`) console.log(response.data) } loadMensagens() }) return ( <>
